com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions

Class GenieException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenieBadRequestException, GenieConflictException, GenieNotFoundException, GeniePreconditionException, GenieServerException, GenieServerUnavailableException

    public class GenieException
extends java.lang.Exception
    The common exception class that represents a service failure. It includes an HTTP error code and a human-readable error message.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
